subject: RE: Eugene | Flock Safety Introduction - Follow Up
body:
Hello,
 
Thank you for the follow up.
 
1.	Flock App � The app is updated.  I tried again and its not even recognizing the license plate in the photo.  I have attached an image where it says no license plate detected.
2.	Freeform -  I am hoping that the freeform demo can be something that�s given to us for a year verse a trial.  EPD has been instrumental in getting two other agencies in our jurisdiction on the system as well as we convinced a bank, OCCU, to fully come online with Flock.  I think our positive impact in getting other agencies and private parties online to be of great enough benefit to warrant that discussion.
3.	Bank -  Yes that is the correct Bank.  They should also have a raven at their 29/Willamette location.
4.	Transparency Portal � We resolved this one together already
5.	Download PDF � Already addressed
6.	Heat Map � Copy
7.	Device Group � Copy
 
Some other questions that have emerged.
1.	Axon API- Currently when adding evidence through the API we receive only the following options (image attached). This is missing a critical field which is �Category�.  This automatically sets our retention period based on current case law.  Is there a way for the API to bring up that option?  Otherwise the feature is pointless as we have to go back in and change this on each piece of uploaded information.  The current plan is to download it and then upload it as we normally do for regular evidence.  If we could have that category section, that would be ideal.
2.	Our parking services/airport are already utilizing Motorola � Vigilant license plate cameras/software.    What would that look like, I believe we would need a Flock Safety Wing Gateway(?) to import that sort of information and make it searchable inside of Flock.
 
I may have some other questions.  Our cameras were not populating on our search map, but that appears to have been resolved as of this week.
 
Derek
 
Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Cell � 541-743-6192
 

 
From: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Friday, May 16, 2025 1:15 PM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Eugene | Flock Safety Introduction - Follow Up
 
[EXTERNAL ?]
Hi 
 
Thank you for joining our call and it was wonderful to chat. You asked really great questions and I'm excited to follow up on our next call on Thursday to make sure they have all been answered. In the meantime, if you don't mind sharing that doc where you had your questions written that would be great (I want to make sure I'm not missing anything). Please let me know if you have any additional ones and I can prepare for our call to walk you through some items. 
 
Here are a few that I was able to get answers on. I will have to circle back with a few team members next week to get the rest:
1.	Flock App - It looks like this is currently only supposed to be used with a vehicle with license plate (photo tool)
	*	Do you mind making sure your app is updated?
	*	Can you try this again? Take a photo of a license plate that you know definitely drove past a camera (could be your vehicle)
2.	Freeform - I will let our team know about Freeform demo and we will get that scheduled
3.	Bank (Raven Alerts) - Can you confirm this is the correct Bank institution?
	*	Chad Dr (HQ) - Oregon Community Credit Union (OR)
	*	Once you confirm I will create a support ticket to make sure that is setup on the backend
4.	Transparency Portal - I sent you the link, let us know if you need any additional edits (include in a word doc and I can update that)
5.	Download PDF  - Your feedback: automatically 1 by 1 vs. all on the same page - too small). I will circle back, I think at this time it will be product feedback rather than a solution we currently have 
6.	Heat Map - Can you search a license plate > right corner instead of going to the map view like we did can you toggle to "look up" and let me know if this works?
	*	Also, on the search card, you can click Nationwide Look Up or State Look Up and you should be able to see the heat map for that as well
	*	Instructions HERE https://help.flocksafety.com/s/article/How-to-Use-the-Lookup-Tool-in-Search  (photo example down below)
	*	
7.	Device Group - This does look like you have to toggle on the device group each time. Supposedly, this is setup for a specific purpose and each agency has a specific use case so it's not a one size fits all model
	*	A small workaround to get a little more of a fix is to click the "flag" on the card to use your last search (you would need to update some of the reasons though such as reason/license plate/etc)
	*	HERE https://help.flocksafety.com/s/article/How-to-Use-the-Search-Tool-Redesign is an article with some instructions (photo example down below)
	*	
 
Let me know if I'm missing anything!
 
Thank you,
Gaby 
-- 
	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager

 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 


 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 
	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=Success&utm_medium=Wisestamp 
	
 
	
 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/m9AoG419PPOj.png>
